metadata.title: CVE-2020-23273 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Heap-buffer overflow in the randomize_iparp function in edit_packet.c. of Tcpreplay v4.3.2 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (DOS) via a crafted pcap.

criterions.comment: tcpreplay package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.3-2').
